moves.name: Counter
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.
